TextEng: I seek your deaths, monsters, and nothing more!
How is it that you speak my language?
What I'm looking for is none of your business.
Text: 내가 찾는 건 네가 알 바 아니야.

TextEng: This is pointless. Time for you to die!
I'm not telling you anything, beast.
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> I can kill you all with ease. I'll ask the questions around here!
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 너희 모두 쉽게 죽일 수 있어. 질문은 내가 할 거야!

TextEng: I'm looking for some artifacts that were stolen from Hilltop.
So you have the artifacts the kobolds stole, then?
Text: 그럼 코볼트들이 훔친 유물을 가지고 있는 거군?

TextEng: That's all I need to know. Time to die!
Text: 알아야 할 건 다 알았어. 이제 죽을 시간이야!

TextEng: I thought you were the chieftain. How could someone command you?
Text: 넌 족장 아니었나? 누가 네게 명령한단 말이야?

TextEng: Why does J'Nah seek these artifacts?
Text: 즈나는 왜 이 유물들을 찾는 거지?

TextEng: You don't sound like you care much for this J'Nah.
Text: 이 즈나를 별로 신경 쓰지 않는 것 같은데.

TextEng: Tell me about this mistress of yours.
Who is this J'Nah you speak of?
I demand that you release the prisoners you've taken!
Release the prisoners or die, fiend!
Text: 포로들을 풀어주든지, 죽든지 해라, 악마 같은 놈!

TextEng: I'm searching for the sorceress J'Nah.
Then I'll simply have to get to her through you, won't I?
Text: 그럼 너를 거쳐서 그녀에게 가야겠군, 그렇지?

TextEng: I think she'll want to see me.
Text: 그녀가 날 보고 싶어 할 거야.

TextEng: I suppose you're right. She probably doesn't want to see me.
Text: 네 말이 맞나 보군. 그녀가 날 보고 싶어 하지 않을 거야.

TextEng: I'm here to kill her... and all of you!
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> We're old friends. She just doesn't know I'm here.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 우린 옛 친구야. 그녀가 내가 여기 있는 걸 모를 뿐이지.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I have important information for her.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Because I can get her what she wants, that's why.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 그녀가 원하는 걸 가져다 줄 수 있으니까.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Because I can get her the artifacts she's looking for.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 그녀가 찾는 유물들을 가져다 줄 수 있으니까.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> That's between me and J'Nah.
I'm tired of this. I'll convince you the hard way.
That's for you to decide.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I could put in a good word with J'Nah for you...
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 즈나에게 네 좋은 말을 전해줄 수 있는데...

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You want to stay on J'Nah's good side, don't you?
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> You'll let me through or I'll kill the rest of you! That's why!
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 날 통과시키든지 아니면 너희 나머지를 죽이든지 해! 그래서야!

TextEng: I'm not agreeing to this!
Very well. I agree to this.
I believe she has some artifacts that were stolen from Hilltop.
Text: 힐탑에서 도난당한 유물들을 가지고 있다고 생각해.

TextEng: I've come to kill her, of course.
Your hated mistress?
And does she know you want to kill her? Because I could always tell her...
Text: 그녀가 네가 자신을 죽이고 싶어 하는 걸 알까? 내가 알려줄 수도 있는데...

TextEng: I certainly have no intention of helping you monsters!
But I don't intend to kill her. I just want to speak to her.
Text: 하지만 그녀를 죽일 생각은 없어. 그냥 얘기하고 싶을 뿐이야.

TextEng: Are you saying you'd help me fight her?
Forget it. I don't need your help.
If she doesn't give me what I want, then yes... I will fight her.
Text: 그녀가 내가 원하는 걸 주지 않으면, 그래... 싸울 거야.

TextEng: If you help me, I will fight her.
I wish passage through these caves, nothing more.
Text: 이 동굴을 통과하고 싶을 뿐이야, 그게 전부야.

TextEng: Then go. Take your tribe and leave.
No, you'll do as *I* wish! I'm in command here, gnoll!
Text: 아니, 넌 *내*가 원하는 대로 할 거야! 여기선 내가 지휘한다, 놀!

TextEng: I've changed my mind. You must die, gnoll.
Text: 마음이 바뀌었어. 넌 죽어야 해, 놀.

TextEng: I have questions I want answered, first.
I want you to leave these caves at once. Pray we never cross paths again!
Text: 당장 이 동굴을 떠나. 다시는 마주치지 않길 바라!

TextEng: Then I am in charge, now! You will do as I say!
Text: 그럼 이제 내가 지휘한다! 내 말대로 해!

TextEng: Not good enough! You do *whatever* I say!
Text: 충분하지 않아! 내가 말하는 *모든 것*을 해!

TextEng: Good. Now answer my questions.
No deal! You die now, monster!
Then answer my questions, first.
I don't have any more questions.
You're going to do whatever I tell you to. I'm in charge, now.
Text: 넌 내가 시키는 대로 할 거야. 이제 내가 책임자야.

TextEng: I'm finished with you... now you die.
Tell me about these ruins J'Nah is in.
Text: 즈나가 있는 폐허에 대해 말해 줘.

TextEng: Where do I find this J'nah?
Text: 이 즈나는 어디서 찾을 수 있지?

TextEng: I want to know everything you do about J'Nah.
Text: 즈나에 대해 네가 아는 모든 걸 알고 싶어.

TextEng: Tell me more about this J'Nah.
Text: 이 즈나에 대해 더 말해 줘.

TextEng: Why does J'Nah seek the artifacts?
You don't seem to like this J'Nah much.
Text: 이 즈나를 별로 좋아하지 않는 것 같은데.

TextEng: Even if I wanted to fight her, I wouldn't want your "help".
Text: 그녀와 싸우고 싶어도, 네 "도움"은 원하지 않아.

TextEng: And does she know you want to kill her? Because I could always tell her...
Text: 그녀가 네가 자신을 죽이고 싶어 하는 걸 알까? 내가 알려줄 수도 있는데...

TextEng: But I don't know if I even intend to fight her.
Are you saying you'd help me fight her?
Forget it. I don't need your "help".
If she doesn't give me what I want, then yes... I will fight her.
Text: 그녀가 내가 원하는 걸 주지 않으면, 그래... 싸울 거야.

TextEng: If you're willing to fight her, then yes... that's what I want.
Text: 네가 그녀와 싸울 의향이 있다면, 그래... 그게 내가 원하는 거야.

TextEng: Do you have any of the artifacts stolen from Hilltop?
Where are those kobolds now?
Nothing. I should go.
I've decided you need to die, creature!
So you are going to help me when I fight J'Nah, correct?
Text: 그럼 즈나와 싸울 때 날 도와주는 거지, 맞지?

TextEng: You mentioned that you wanted J'Nah gone?
I demand that you release the prisoners you've taken!
Fine, do what you like.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Is there nothing I can offer you in exchange for them?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 그들과 교환할 수 있는 게 아무것도 없을까?

TextEng: Release them or die, fiend!
Text: 풀어주든지 죽든지 해라, 악마 같은 놈!

TextEng: Slaves?! That's horrible!
I have some questions.
Good. Let's keep it that way.
I want some gnolls to travel with me.
Text: 놀 몇 명이 나와 함께 가길 원해.

TextEng: Fine, have it your way.
I'll go now, then.
I think I'll kill you now, fool!
Bah! This is useless! Die!!
You will do as I say, gnoll!
I thought you agreed to obey me?
I want some changes made to the way you do things.
Text: 네가 하는 방식에 몇 가지 변화를 원해.

TextEng: So you are going to help me when I fight J'Nah, correct?
Text: 그럼 즈나와 싸울 때 날 도와주는 거지, 맞지?

TextEng: Then perhaps you will release your prisoners.
Then battle it is!
No, I don't want that.
I'll be going now.
Why be glad? You're next, monster!
Text: 왜 기뻐해? 다음은 네 차례야, 괴물!

TextEng: Now take your tribe and leave this area. I don't want to see you ever again.
Text: 이제 부족을 데리고 이 지역을 떠나. 다시는 보고 싶지 않아.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> I think it's time to give some tribute to your ruler, don't you agree?
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 네 지배자에게 공물을 바칠 시간인 것 같은데, 동의하지 않아?

TextEng: You are very welcome.
And I thank you for helping me fight her.
